metadata.titleEn: Geochemical element parameter datasett of a representative permafrost  wetland in the mid-late Holocene in the headwater area of the Yellow River (HAYR)
metadata.titleCn: 黄河源区代表性多年冻土湿地中晚全新世典型地球化学元素参数数据集
metadata.description: The Maduo Xiang (Maduo Village) permafrost wetland profile (35°02′24″ N, 96°15′36″ E, 4490 m) was located on a south slope, ca. 10 km from Maduo Xiang (Maduo Village), in the northwestern HAYR in the north of Bayan Har Mountains. Geochemical element content were carried out using an X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (Magix PW2403, the Netherlands), with an estimated error of less than 0.3% for geochemical elements. Reconstructions of the Holocene (especially the mid-Holocene) climatic and environmental changes may serve as an analogue for future scenarios.
metadata.descriptionCn: 麻多乡多年冻土湿地剖面（35.04°N, 96.26°E）位于巴颜喀拉山北侧的黄河源区麻多乡以西约10 km处。AMS碳14年代由美国Beta实验室测定，根据校准的年代数据进行线性内插和外推法来确定其它深度的年代。用X射线荧光光谱仪（Magix PW2403，荷兰）测试土壤沉积物的地球化学元素含量，测量误差为0.3%。通过该剖面代表性地球化学元素的含量及比率的变化，可以指示~7000 yr B.P.以来土壤化学风化作用等的变化，进而反映~7000 yr B.P.以来区域气候变化。这可以为研究~7000 yr B.P.以来黄河源区区域气候、环境变化提供背景信息以及预估未来的气候、环境变化提供参考。
metadata.instructions: Representative data of the Geochemical elements in text format storage, the name of the file for "element Geochemical content. TXT".Data read method: the data set all of the ASCII file can be directly opened by text program (like notepad).In addition to the header file, the main content for s and element content of numerical representation.
metadata.instructionsCn: 代表性地球化学元素含量数据以文本格式存储，文件的名称为“Geochemical element content.txt”。数据读取方式：该数据集中的所有ASCII码文件可以直接用文本程序（如记事本）打开。除了头文件，主体内容为数值表征的年代及元素含量。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of geochemical element parameters used in studying Holocene soil weathering and climate change in permafrost wetlands?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在研究永久冻土湿地的全新世土壤风化和气候变化时，所使用的地球化学元素参数的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 0.3% measurement error, changes in soil chemical weathering, reflect regional climate changes
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 0.3%的测量误差，土壤化学风化的变化反映了区域气候变化。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the measurement error associated with the geochemical element content in the soil sediments using the X-ray fluorescence spectrometer method?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用X射线荧光光谱法测定土壤沉积物中地球化学元素含量的测量误差是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a geochemical element parameter dataset in the context of permafrost wetlands?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是多年冻土湿地环境中的地球化学元素参数数据集？
Definition.AnswerEn: A geochemical element parameter dataset in the context of permafrost wetlands refers to a collection of data that includes the concentrations and ratios of geochemical elements within soil sediments from permafrost wetlands. This dataset is used to indicate changes in soil chemical weathering processes over time, which can further reflect regional climate changes since approximately 7000 years before present (B.P.). Such a dataset is typically derived from soil core samples and analyzed using techniques like X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy to measure element concentrations with a specified error margin.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在永冻土湿地的背景下，地球化学元素参数数据集指的是一个包含永冻土湿地土壤沉积物中地球化学元素浓度和比率的数据集合。该数据集用于指示土壤化学风化过程随时间的变化，这进一步反映了自大约7000年前（B.P.）以来的区域气候变化。这样的数据集通常来源于土壤岩心样本，并使用X射线荧光光谱法等技术分析元素浓度，具有特定的误差范围。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying factors that contribute to the variability in geochemical element parameters in permafrost wetlands over the mid-to-late Holocene?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致中晚全新世永冻土湿地中地球化学元素参数变异的潜在因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability in geochemical element parameters in permafrost wetlands over the mid-to-late Holocene is influenced by changes in soil chemical weathering and regional climate variations since approximately 7000 years B.P. Such changes can be identified through the analysis of geochemical element content and their ratios, which provide insights into historical climate and environmental shifts in the Yellow River source region.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在中晚全新世期间，永冻土湿地中地球化学元素参数的变异性受到土壤化学风化和区域气候变化的影响，自大约7000年前以来。这些变化可以通过分析地球化学元素含量及其比率来识别，从而提供对黄河源区历史气候和环境变化的洞察。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on understanding regional climate change if a dataset uses X-ray fluorescence spectrometry to analyze geochemical element content in permafrost wetland profiles?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果一个数据集使用X射线荧光光谱法分析永冻土湿地剖面的地球化学元素含量，那么对理解区域气候变化的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: By using X-ray fluorescence spectrometry to analyze geochemical element content, researchers can track changes in soil chemical weathering processes over approximately 7000 years. This can provide insights into historical regional climate changes and offer valuable context for predicting future climate and environmental shifts in the Yellow River source area.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 通过使用X射线荧光光谱法分析地球化学元素含量，研究人员可以追踪大约7000年来土壤化学风化过程的变化。这可以提供对历史区域气候变化的洞察，并为预测黄河源区未来的气候和环境变化提供有价值的背景。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to measure and analyze geochemical element concentrations in soil sediments for assessing historical climate changes in permafrost wetlands?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于测量和分析土壤沉积物中地球化学元素浓度以评估永久冻土湿地历史气候变化的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Geochemical element concentrations in soil sediments are measured using an X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (Magix PW2403, Netherlands) with a measurement error of 0.3%. The data are used to analyze the changes in geochemical element content and ratios, which indicate soil chemical weathering variations and reflect regional climate changes since approximately 7000 years before present.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土壤沉积物中的地球化学元素浓度使用X射线荧光光谱仪（Magix PW2403，荷兰）进行测量，测量误差为0.3%。这些数据用于分析地球化学元素含量和比率的变化，指示土壤化学风化的变化，并反映自大约7000年前以来的区域气候变化。
